description: Try our easy to follow Satay Tofu Salad With Seed & Carrot Pesto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Satay Tofu Salad With Seed & Carrot Pesto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: coriander leaves, pepitas, sesame seeds and sunflower seeds to garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Slice 200g firm satay tofu. Pan-fry in 1 tbs olive oil until crisp. Allow to cool then slice. Divide 100g baby spinach leaves between 4 bowls. Top with 300g pkt rainbow coleslaw, 1 sliced cucumber, 1 sliced tomato and tofu. To serve, top with 1/3 cup Seed & carrot pesto (see recipe), and coriander leaves, pepitas, sesame seeds and sunflower seeds to taste. Note: For this recipe you will need to refer to the seed & carrot pesto recipe.
